channel.title: HOLY MUSTARD - Dadmother (metal track)
channel.description:
EDIT: This track feels like it‚Äôs where it needs to be to me, so to the Finished Track thread it goes üò¨ Thank you to any and all feedback since it‚Äôs been posted!
I suppose this is somewhere between a Work In Progress and a Finished Track because this may be the final iteration, BUT I‚ÄôM NOT SURE YET.
Anyway...
This is one of my most fun attempts at a metal track in Auxy. It‚Äôs a take on the more epic, adventurous side of metal, with some thrashy elements. Blast beats, skank beats, breakdowns, solos, everything. I wanted to create good atmosphere, but also make the core of the track very powerful.
This title was a silly working title, but I‚Äôm liking it more and more.
Here‚Äôs ‚ÄúHoly Mustard‚Äù!
https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/holy-mustard/s-WYTqN ![image|637x500](upload://bWwVHGYu9u7BSPwv0MSrYvqwrcF.jpeg)

item.title: HOLY MUSTARD - Dadmother (metal track)
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Dude, thank you so much for the kind words! I‚Äôm a huge metalhead, for sure. A 16-bit epic metal sound is definitely what I was trying to embrace, and I‚Äôm truly grateful for the feedback. Thanks again, friend!

Read full topic

item.title: HOLY MUSTARD - Dadmother (metal track)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Haha this is awesome. I can say I‚Äôve never heard anything like this out of Auxy. I‚Äôm a bit of a secret metal head.

Blast beats on point, solo work on point. It almost sounds like it could be a 16bit remix of a metal track.

Vibe at ~2mins is crazy. So good.

Read full topic

item.title: HOLY MUSTARD - Dadmother (metal track)
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
EDIT: This track feels like it‚Äôs where it needs to be to me, so to the Finished Track thread it goes Thank you to any and all feedback since it‚Äôs been posted!

I suppose this is somewhere between a Work In Progress and a Finished Track because this may be the final iteration, BUT I‚ÄôM NOT SURE YET.

Anyway‚Ä¶

This is one of my most fun attempts at a metal track in Auxy. It‚Äôs a take on the more epic, adventurous side of metal, with some thrashy elements. Blast beats, skank beats, breakdowns, solos, everything. I wanted to create good atmosphere, but also make the core of the track very powerful.

This title was a silly working title, but I‚Äôm liking it more and more.

Here‚Äôs ‚ÄúHoly Mustard‚Äù!
